name: Beyond Doors
description:
Prepare to be enchanted by a precision platforming adventure, where
each step is filled with the allure of an enthralling atmosphere.

Are you ready to unravel the mysteries and conquer the challenges that lie ahead?
Destiny awaits.


Features:
♦ 3 Worlds with unique environments.
♦ 35 hand-craft levels.
♦ Difficulty progression for a growing challenge over the levels.
♦ Beautiful and atmospheric 2D hand-drawn art.
♦ Full gamepad support for a better experience.
